column4: uhm, no quite the opposite.  you are confusing lilo properties with grub properties.  as long as the paths are the same it should be fine.

I think the issue here is that somehow the boot sector got borked. Reinstalling Ubuntu without GRUB is not magically going to bring back the Windows bootloader. Not sure what any of this has to do with LILO.
I think we're trying to dual-boot.
Indeed, it typically does work automatically.
